name: Derick
description: Derick is in need of a cuppa, but there is no milk left.  He needs to make it to the shop. However, everything around his way is properly lethal and is trying to end him. Jump over or run under the enemies and avoid the spikes, pits and lava to make it through the 5 stages of this epic thriller and make it to the shop. Use the arrow keys to navigate through the weird world of Derick. If you think it's shit, hit Escape to end your misery.
